definitions.definition: The largest of the primates , belonging to the genus Gorilla ; an ape native to the forests of central Africa and known for their trait of knuckle-walking .
A big and brutish man or a thug ; a goon or ruffian .
A powerful person or organization; a heavyweight or behemoth .

main_definition: The largest of the primates , belonging to the genus Gorilla ; an ape native to the forests of central Africa and known for their trait of knuckle-walking .
secondary_definitions: A big and brutish man or a thug ; a goon or ruffian .
( informal ) A powerful person or organization; a heavyweight or behemoth .
( slang , UK , Australia ) 1000 pounds sterling or dollar .
